data.comment: Eupen kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! Cercle Brugge have got their heads in front thanks to a Kylian Hazard strike.
In the minute 14, Stef Peeters (Eupen) gets a yellow card.
Knowledge Musona (Eupen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Julien Ngoy grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Kehrweg Stadium.
In the minute 43, Jordi Amat for Eupen has been booked by Jasper Vergoote and receives a first yellow card.
The first half has been concluded at Kehrweg Stadium.
The second half is underway in Eupen - Cercle Brugge with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Jeremy Taravel (Cercle Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
Kylian Hazard is booked for the away team.
Vitinho is replacing Dimitar Velkovski for the away team.
In the minute 68, Leonardo da Silva Lopes is on a sub for Franck Kanoute for Cercle Brugge.
Benat San Jose Gil (Eupen) is making a first substitution, with Konan N'Dri replacing Knowledge Musona.
Goal! A Anthony Musaba header gives Cercle Brugge a 1-2 lead in Eupen.
In the minute 84, Menno Koch is booked for the home team.
Isaac Nuhu is replacing Edo Kayembe for Eupen at Kehrweg Stadium.
The away team replace Kylian Hazard with Thibo Somers.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Thibo Somers (Cercle Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
Eupen's Adriano has been booked in Eupen.
At Kehrweg Stadium, Ike Ugbo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
